result.name: COUCHBASE_RAM_QUOTA_TOTAL
result.description: Total quota of memory allocated by the Couchbase cluster for this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_RAM_QUOTA_USED
result.description: Amount of memory used on this node by Couchbase from the allocated quota.

result.name: COUCHBASE_CPU_USAGE_RATE
result.description: CPU utilization percent.

result.name: COUCHBASE_RAM_SYSTEM_TOTAL
result.description: Total amount of memory on this node as reported by Couchbase.

result.name: COUCHBASE_RAM_SYSTEM_FREE
result.description: Amount of memory used on this node as reported by Couchbase.

result.name: COUCHBASE_SWAP_TOTAL
result.description: Total swap space on this node as reported by Couchbase.

result.name: COUCHBASE_SWAP_USED
result.description: Used swap space on this node as reported by Couchbase.

result.name: COUCHBASE_OPERATIONS
result.description: Number of currently on-going operations on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_DOCUMENTS_COUNT
result.description: Number of documents stored on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_DOCUMENTS_SIZE
result.description: Size of the data in the documents stored on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_DOCUMENTS_SIZE_ON_DISK
result.description: Size on disk of the documents stored on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_VIEWS_SIZE
result.description: Size of the data in the indexed views on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_VIEWS_SIZE_ON_DISK
result.description: Size on disk of the indexed views on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_DOCUMENTS_FRAGMENTATION
result.description: Rate of fragmentation of document data.

result.name: COUCHBASE_VIEWS_FRAGMENTATION
result.description: Rate of fragmentation of views data (i.e. indexes).

result.name: COUCHBASE_VIEWS_OPERATIONS
result.description: Number of currently on-going views-related operations on this node (e.g. queries).

result.name: COUCHBASE_DISK_COMMIT_TIME
result.description: Average time for disk commit operations on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_DISK_UPDATE_TIME
result.description: Average time for disk update operations on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_CAS_HITS
result.description: Number of successful CAS comparisons.

result.name: COUCHBASE_CAS_MISSES
result.description: Number of unsuccessful CAS comparisons.

result.name: COUCHBASE_DISK_FETCHES
result.description: Number of times Couchbase went to disk to get data (non-resident data) per second.

result.name: COUCHBASE_EVICTIONS
result.description: Number of times COuchbase evicted data from the resident memory to free-up space.

result.name: COUCHBASE_MISSES
result.description: Number of operations on missing documents.

result.name: COUCHBASE_XDCR_OPERATIONS
result.description: Cross-datacenter replication operations on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_REPLICATION_CHANGES_LEFT
result.description: Number of replication operations queued and yet to be performed.

result.name: COUCHBASE_MAJOR_FAULTS
result.description: Number of major faults on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_MINOR_FAULTS
result.description: Number of minor faults on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_PAGE_FAULTS
result.description: Number of memory page faults on this node.

result.name: COUCHBASE_ACTIVE_CONNECTIONS
result.description: Number of currently active connections established with this node.
